about_the_game:
Step into a vibrant and exciting online world where players can run, jump, and explore a variety of colorful and dynamic platforms. Test your skills, challenge others, and discover countless surprises in a game designed to bring joy and laughter to everyone.

Key Features:

  • Multiplayer Gameplay: Connect with friends or compete against players from around the world in real-time online sessions.

  • Dynamic Platform Challenges: Navigate through unique and diverse levels filled with exciting obstacles, puzzles, and hidden secrets.

  • Global Leaderboards: Track your progress and compare your scores with players across all platforms.

  • Smooth Controls: Enjoy intuitive and responsive controls designed to ensure a seamless gameplay experience.

  • Vibrant Graphics: Immerse yourself in colorful and beautifully crafted environments that evolve as you play.

  • Fun for Everyone: Perfect for players of all ages and skill levels, offering a mix of casual fun and competitive challenges.

name: Parkour Skyrun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Where leaps spark joy and friendship lights the way.
